Title: Authorizes certain school districts in the county of Suffolk to use school buses for the transportation of school personnel in certain cases
Summary: Authorizes certain school districts within the towns of Southampton and East Hampton in the county of Suffolk to use school buses for the transportation of school personnel in certain cases.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing certain school districts in the county of Suffolk to use school buses for the transportation of school personnel in certain cases
